panels.description: The number of pods that are up and ready for processing
panels.title: Ready Pods

panels.description: The average number of overall transactions per second
panels.title: TPS

panels.description: The average transaction size
panels.title: Transaction Size

panels.description: The amount of time it took to successfully parse the record file
panels.title: Record Parse Duration

panels.description: The difference in the consensus time of the last transaction in the file and the time at which the file was processed successfully
panels.title: Record Parse Latency

panels.description: Amount of time it took to successfully parse the balance file
panels.title: Balance Parse Duration

panels.description: The transactions per second broken down by type
panels.title: Transaction Rate

panels.description: The amount of time it took to publish the domain entity
panels.title: Publish Duration

panels.description: The amount of memory consumed by the application
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: The amount of CPU consumed by the application
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The number of threads in use by the JVM
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: The rate of HTTP requests received
panels.title: HTTP Requests

panels.description: The number of open file descriptors used by the process
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: The number of rows per table
panels.title: Table Rows

panels.description: The size of the table and indexes on disk
panels.title: Total Size

panels.description: The size of the table on disk
panels.title: Table Size

panels.description: The size of the indexes on disk
panels.title: Index Size

panels.description: The number of queries per second executed by the database
panels.title: Database Operations

panels.description: The time it took to batch insert rows
panels.title: Batch Insert Latency

panels.description: The number of rows inserted into the table
panels.title: Batch Insert Rows

panels.description: The amount of time it takes to invoke the Spring Data repository method to execute a query.
panels.title: Query Latency

panels.description: The number of database connections in the pool
panels.title: Connection Pool

panels.description: The number of database connections
panels.title: JDBC Connections

panels.description: The percent of time the value is retrieved from the cache

targets.expr: sum (cache_gets_total{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod",result="hit"}) by (cache_manager, cache) / sum (cache_gets_total{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$pod"}) by (cache_manager, cache)

panels.title: Cache Hit

panels.description: The number of entries in the cache
panels.title: Cache Size

panels.description: The number of cache gets per second
panels.title: Cache Get Rate

panels.description: The number of cache puts per second
panels.title: Cache Put Rate

panels.description: The rate of log events written by the application
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: The log events
panels.title: Messages

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer polls cloud storage for stream files
panels.title: Stream List Rate

panels.description: How long it took to search for new stream files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (action) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (action) > 0

panels.title: Stream Download Latency

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer downloads stream file signatures from cloud storage
panels.title: Download Stream Signature Rate

panels.description: How long it took to download the signature file from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) > 0

panels.title: Download Stream Signature Latency

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer downloads stream files from cloud storage
panels.title: Download Stream File Rate

panels.description: How long it took to download stream files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) > 0

panels.title: Download Stream File Latency

panels.description: The average stream file size

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) > 0

panels.title: Download Stream File Size

panels.description: The average stream signature file size

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) > 0

panels.title: Download Signature File Size

panels.description: The average file size of the stream list response from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="list", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="list", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) > 0

panels.title: Stream List Size

panels.description: The rate at which different node's signatures reach consensus
panels.title: Signature Verification Rate

panels.description: The rate at which the stream file reaches consensus, hash chain verified (if applicable) and hash matches signature
panels.title: Stream File Verification Rate

panels.description: The duration in seconds it took to reach consensus,  verify hash chain (if applicable) and hash matches the signature.

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_stream_verification_seconds_sum{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="$stream"}[$__rate_interval])) by (success) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_stream_verification_seconds_count{application="$application",cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="$stream"}[$__rate_interval])) by (success) > 0

panels.title: Stream File Verification Latency

panels.description: HTTP errors interacting with cloud storage
panels.title: Cloud Storage Error Rate

panels.description: The difference between the consensus time of the last and first transaction in the stream file
panels.title: Stream File Close Interval

panels.description: The duration in seconds it took to parse the file and store it in the database
panels.title: Stream Parse Duration

panels.description: The difference in time between the consensus time of the last transaction in the file and the time at which the file was created in the cloud storage provider
panels.title: Cloud Storage Latency

panels.description: The difference in time between the consensus time of the last transaction in the file and the time at which the file was downloaded and verified
panels.title: Download Latency

panels.description: The difference in the consensus time of the last transaction in the file and the time at which the file was processed successfully
panels.title: Parser Latency

list.description: Name of the Loki datasource to use
list.label: Loki
list.name: loki

list.description: Name of the Prometheus datasource to use
list.label: Prometheus
list.name: prometheus
